zh.title: 瑞波币/美元技术分析：震荡整理走势
zh.content:
当前瑞波币/美元（XRP/USD）在1.48附近震荡整理，整体走势表现为横盘。价格未能突破近期高点1.49302，显示出短期内缺乏明确的方向性。市场情绪较为谨慎，短期内可能继续维持区间震荡格局。

从技术指标来看，当前的MACD值为负（-0.0026），这表明短期内卖压较大，但由于信号线数据缺失，趋势的持续性尚不明朗。SMA(20)线位于1.47850，进一步确认了价格的短期支撑水平。RSI数据缺失，但根据现有价格走势来看，市场尚未表现出过度超买或超卖的状态。

支撑位方面，1.48132是近期低点，若跌破此位置，可能会测试1.47附近的更强支撑。阻力位则位于1.49302附近，突破该点位后，可能会进一步向1.50及更高价位进发。因此，短期内价格在1.48-1.49区间内波动的可能性较大。

建议在当前价格附近采取观望策略。若价格接近支撑位1.48132，可考虑短线做多，而若突破1.49302的阻力位，则可考虑顺势跟进。但总体而言，风险较高，谨慎操作为宜。

en.title: Ripple vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
XRP/USD is currently exhibiting a modestly bearish tone, trading slightly below yesterday’s high of 1.4930. The price is hovering around 1.4828, just above the 20-period simple moving average at 1.4785, suggesting the short-term trend remains cautiously supportive. While the daily change is marginal at -0.31%, the narrow high-low range indicates market indecision. Traders should monitor whether XRP sustains above the SMA, as a drop below could signal increased downward momentum.  

Momentum indicators show mixed signals. The MACD currently reads -0.0026, indicating the short-term momentum is leaning bearish. Although the signal line isn’t available, the negative MACD suggests selling pressure is slightly outweighing buying interest. Without an RSI value, assessing overbought or oversold conditions is limited, but the proximity to the SMA hints the market is near equilibrium. Any rebound above recent highs could reignite bullish interest in the short term.  

Key support levels appear near 1.4780, aligning with the 20-period SMA, and a secondary floor around 1.4715, which has held during prior pullbacks. On the upside, resistance is evident at 1.4930, with stronger barriers at 1.5000 psychological levels. Breaching these zones could pave the way for a clearer bullish trend, while a breakdown under support might trigger accelerated selling, possibly targeting 1.4700 as the next technical floor.  

Traders may consider cautious strategies in this consolidative phase. Short-term buyers might enter near the SMA, targeting a retest of 1.4930, while keeping tight stops just below 1.4780. Conversely, short sellers could look for rejections at resistance, particularly if momentum indicators remain negative. Overall, XRP/USD is balanced between minor bullish recovery and bearish pressure, making careful position sizing and attention to intraday price action essential.
